author: Adrian Burns
comment: Always liked this watchface but, since Wear 2.0 update, if you long-press to go to settings, the watch returns in square face mode on my LG Urbane, which has a round face. Hopefully a bug which will be fixed soon.

reply.author: WatchMaster
reply.content:
Hello Adrian. 
Thank you for the feedback and we are sorry for the inconvenience. 
We were trying to located the problem you were referring to but couldn't find. Please send us a screenshot or more detail information of the problem via email (ask.watchmaster@gmail.com) and we will help you solve it. We are again very sorry. 
Thank you.

author: Dale Huhtala
comment: Simple and looks like a glow in the dark watchface.  I really like it...I would go 5 stars if it had a weather option.
title: Looks great

comment: Stop adding more steps to use watch.
title: Why do I have to install another app to use a watch face.

author: Jacob Perego
comment: It won't go on my watch. Thought it looked cool but looks like an app on my phone but doesn't download on my watch or have the option to on the app. Very very very dissatisfied. Give me my money back
title: Won't download to gear s2

author: Andi Darmika
comment: Can you add one more setting to the ambient mode so I can adjust the brightness for ambient mode please...

author: Jay Ochs
comment: love the watch face. looks great.
title: nice!

author: Travis Faubel
comment: Please add transparent peek cards!
title: Very good looking watch face

author: Ben Hersey
comment: I couldnt improve it. Love the full ambient.
title: Perfect

author: Luigi Porcu
comment: This watch offer no customization Missing weather phone call and messaging but huge propaganda watch name
title: No customization what so ever

author: Tyler Bare
comment: I really think there should be the option to choose either the dials or just a numeric option for the %s. The face would be 5 start if it were to have that option.
title: This face is beautiful but

author: Edward Hanapole
comment: Modern fonts and colors that really make the Urbane look even more amazing.
title: Great on the Urbane

comment: Thank! Exactly what I was looking for.
title: Awesome

comment: Awesome ambient mode.
title: G watch

author: Jake Jeong
comment: Nice face!!!
title: Love it

author: Peter Paulo Dangoy
comment: Upon closer examination, it is not the one hogging the battery. This is a nice to look at watchface. Wishing there are other sensor displays on the face in the future.
title: Edit : Not the cause of Battery drain.

author: _ Baldwin
comment: Was worried that the ambient mode would use too much battery but it doesn't. It looks great and functions great. Kudos. 5 stars if could change colors.
title: Great face

author: Houman brinjcargorabi
comment: Would love it if I could remove the numbers except 12 and 6
title: Loved it but

author: Paul Brew
comment: One of the best watch faces I have downloaded.
title: Beautiful

author: Scott Haynes
comment: Mine only installed one watch face, where is the 2nd one?

author: Aaron Leyh
comment: Nuff said looks great
title: Awesome

author: Giovonni Fareed
comment: Nice!

author: Eldridge Brown
comment: Having an extra app for managing this watchface is unnecessary, considering there aren't many useful options. I want to be able to adjust the active time (to 15 seconds). It would also be great to eliminate the "6" or bump it up slightly. It's cut off by the Moto 360's flat tire. Other popular watchesfaces account for this.
title: Could Be Improved

author: Troy Phillips
comment: Never showed up on Android wear or their app after paying. Got refund.
